# angularMotionAroundX

**Instance Property**

The angular motion limits around the x-axis.

## Declaration

```swift
var angularMotionAroundX: PhysicsCustomJoint.MotionLimit
```

## Discussion

This property sets the limits of `pin1` around the x-axis of `pin0`.
title: angularMotionAroundX
